Uses of Class
camzup.core.Knot3

Packages that use Knot3 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Knot3 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Knot3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Knot3 Knot3.adoptForeHandle​(Knot3 source)
    Adopts the fore handle of a source knot.
    Knot3 Knot3.adoptHandles​(Knot3 source)
    Adopts the fore handle and rear handle of a source knot.
    Knot3 Knot3.adoptRearHandle​(Knot3 source)
    Adopts the rear handle of a source knot.
    Knot3 Knot3.alignHandles()
    Aligns this knot's handles in the same direction while preserving their magnitude.
    Knot3 Knot3.alignHandlesBackward()
    Aligns this knot's fore handle to its rear handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot3 Knot3.alignHandlesForward()
    Aligns this knot's rear handle to its fore handle while preserving magnitude.
    Knot3 Knot3.AbstrEasing.apply​(Knot3 origin, Knot3 dest, java.lang.Float step, Knot3 target)
    A clamped interpolation between the origin and destination.
    abstract Knot3 Knot3.AbstrEasing.applyUnclamped​(Knot3 origin, Knot3 dest, float step, Knot3 target)
    The interpolation to be defined by subclasses.
    Knot3 Knot3.Lerp.applyUnclamped​(Knot3 origin, Knot3 dest, float step, Knot3 target)
    Eases between two knots by a step using the formula (1.0 - t) * a + t * b .
    static Knot3 Curve3.eval​(Curve3 curve, float step, Knot3 target)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] , returning a knot on the curve.
    static Knot3 CurveEntity3.eval​(CurveEntity3 ce, int curveIndex, float step, Knot3 knWorld, Knot3 knLocal)
    Evaluates a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] for a curve in the entity, returning a knot.
    static Knot3 Curve3.evalFirst​(Curve3 curve, Knot3 target)
    Evaluates the first knot in the curve.
    static Knot3 Curve3.evalLast​(Curve3 curve, Knot3 target)
    Evaluates the last knot in the curve.
    static Knot3 Knot3.fromSegCubic​(float xPrevControl, float yPrevControl, float zPrevControl, float xNextControl, float yNextControl, float zNextControl, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of the cubic curve.
    static Knot3 Knot3.fromSegCubic​(Vec3 prevControl, Vec3 nextControl, Vec3 nextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of the cubic curve.
    static Knot3 Knot3.fromSegLinear​(float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
    Sets a knot from line segment.
    static Knot3 Knot3.fromSegLinear​(Vec3 nextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
    Sets a knot from line segment.
    static Knot3 Knot3.fromSegQuadratic​(float xControl, float yControl, float zControl, float xNextAnchor, float yNextAnchor, float zNextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of the quadratic curve.
    static Knot3 Knot3.fromSegQuadratic​(Vec3 control, Vec3 nextAnchor, Knot3 prev, Knot3 next)
    Sets two knots from a segment of the quadratic curve.
    Knot3 Curve3.get​(int i)
    Gets a knot from the curve by an index.
    Knot3 Curve3.getFirst()
    Gets the first knot in the curve.
    Knot3 Curve3.getLast()
    Gets the last knot in the curve.
    Knot3 Knot3.mirrorHandles()
    Mirrors this knot's handles.
    Knot3 Knot3.mirrorHandlesBackward()
    Sets the forward-facing handle to mirror the rear-facing handle: the fore will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the rear.
    Knot3 Knot3.mirrorHandlesForward()
    Sets the rear-facing handle to mirror the forward-facing handle: the rear will have the same magnitude and negated direction of the fore.
    static Knot3 Knot3.mix​(Knot3 origin, Knot3 dest, float step, Knot3 target, Knot3.AbstrEasing easingFunc)
    Mixes two knots together by a step in [0.0, 1.0] with the help of an easing function.
    Knot3 Knot3.relocate​(Vec3 v)
    Relocates the knot to a new location while maintaining the relationship between the central coordinate and its two handles.
    Knot3 Curve3.removeAt​(int i)
    Returns and removes a knot at a given index.
    Knot3 Curve3.removeFirst()
    Returns and removes the first knot in the curve.
    Knot3 Curve3.removeLast()
    Removes and returns the last knot in the curve.
    Knot3 Knot3.reverse()
    Reverses the knot's direction by swapping the fore- and rear-handles.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotate​(float cosa, float sina, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates this knot around an axis by an angle in radians.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotate​(float radians, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates this knot around an arbitrary axis by an angle in radians.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotate​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates this knot by a quaternion.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateForeHandle​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates this knot's fore handle by a quaternion with its coordinate serving as a pivot.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateHandles​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates this knot's handles by a quaternion with its coordinate serving as a pivot.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateRearHandle​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates this knot's rear handle by a quaternion with its coordinate serving as a pivot.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateX​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot around the x axis by an angle in radians.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateX​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates a knot around the x axis.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateY​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot around the y axis by an angle in radians.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateY​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates a knot around the y axis.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates this knot around the z axis by an angle in radians.
    Knot3 Knot3.rotateZ​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates a knot around the z axis.
    Knot3 Knot3.scale​(float scale)
    Scales this knot by a factor.
    Knot3 Knot3.scale​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales this knot by a non-uniform scalar.
    Knot3 Knot3.scaleForeHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the fore handle by a factor.
    Knot3 Knot3.scaleForeHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the fore handle to a magnitude
    Knot3 Knot3.scaleHandlesBy​(float scalar)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle by a factor.
    Knot3 Knot3.scaleHandlesTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales both the fore and rear handle to a magnitude.
    Knot3 Knot3.scaleRearHandleBy​(float scalar)
    Scales the rear handle by a factor.
    Knot3 Knot3.scaleRearHandleTo​(float magnitude)
    Scales the rear handle to a magnitude
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord)
    Sets the coordinate, fore- and rear-handles to the input coordinate.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float zFore)
    Sets the knot's coordinates and fore handle.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(float xCoord, float yCoord, float zCoord, float xFore, float yFore, float zFore, float xRear, float yRear, float zRear)
    Sets the knot's coordinate, fore handle and rear handle by component.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(Knot2 source)
    Sets this knot from a source knot.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(Knot3 source)
    Sets this knot from a source knot.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(Vec2 coord, Vec2 foreHandle, Vec2 rearHandle)
    Sets this knot from a series of 2D vectors.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(Vec3 coord)
    Sets the coordinate, fore- and rear-handles to the input coordinate.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(Vec3 coord, Vec3 foreHandle)
    Sets the knot's coordinates and fore handle.
    Knot3 Knot3.set​(Vec3 coord, Vec3 foreHandle, Vec3 rearHandle)
    Sets this knot from a series of vectors.
    static Knot3 Knot3.smoothHandles​(Knot3 prev, Knot3 curr, Knot3 next, Vec3 carry)
    Smoothes the handles of a knot with reference to a previous and next knot.
    static Knot3 Knot3.smoothHandlesFirst​(Knot3 curr, Knot3 next, Vec3 carry)
    Smoothes the fore handle of the first knot in an open curve.
    static Knot3 Knot3.smoothHandlesLast​(Knot3 prev, Knot3 curr, Vec3 carry)
    Smoothes the rear handle of the last knot in an open curve.
    Knot3 Knot3.transform​(Mat4 m)
    Multiplies this knot by a matrix.
    Knot3 Knot3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Multiplies this knot by a transform.
    Knot3 Knot3.translate​(Vec3 v)
    Translates this knot by a vector.
    Methods in camzup.core that return types with arguments of type Knot3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Iterator<Knot3> Curve3.iterator()
    Returns an iterator, which allows an enhanced for-loop to access the knots in a curve.

    Compares this knot to another based on a comparison between coordinates.

    static Vec3 Knot3.foreDir​(Knot3 knot, Vec3 target)
    Gets the fore handle of a knot as a direction, rather than as a point.
    static float Knot3.foreMag​(Knot3 knot)
    Returns the magnitude of the knot's fore handle, i.e., the Euclidean distance between the fore handle and the coordinate.
    static Vec3 Knot3.foreVec​(Knot3 knot, Vec3 target)
    Gets the fore handle of a knot as a vector, rather than as a point.
